name: Tower Hero Quest - Demo
description:
I developed this game myself as part of a local game jam in 5 days.

It's Tower Defense combined with RPG elements.

This is just a demo version, so please don't judge strictly :) And I know there are a lot of things to do, for example: balancing, new levels, boss fight, cutscenes, tutorials, etc.

By the way, the binaries of the game are more than 1GB, so I uploaded them to my drive and put the links here.
